data.text: @ReneforOECTA @VaxHuntersCan Couldn’t agree more! Doing more than the government could ever dream of. True hero’s, saving lives!

@re2bs @VaxHuntersCan There are lessons to be learned and this effort deserves some recognition and an award when this is all done. Thank you all for your work to keep communities safer without the premiers help.
@nickiozzo @VaxHuntersCan First & Second shots all done! Thank you! 😊🥳
@re2bs @VaxHuntersCan First or second shots? Congrats none the less!!

@re2bs @flyingpilz @VaxHuntersCan Oh my gosh I had forgotten!!! That has totally made my night. Thank you. And thank you for YOUR role, too, in protecting everyone around you - and everyone around them! ❤️

@DrJessicaLanger @flyingpilz @VaxHuntersCan I remember earlier this week you had also tipped me off about a second Moderna dose! Thank you so much for your role in helping people get vaccinated. Whether it be a stranger like myself or friends/family. Every shot counts! I owe you one too, Jessica!

@re2bs @flyingpilz @VaxHuntersCan I’m the one in mine! I got my mom her second AZ dose, myself my second Moderna, and probably two dozen other friends and family their second doses (including veeeery high risk folks). Got doses for a student’s parents too!!
@re2bs @VaxHuntersCan Vaxhunters: Whole world is my family
@flyingpilz @VaxHuntersCan It’s a tough hat to wear but so rewarding! 😅
@re2bs @VaxHuntersCan I’m the vaccine hunter in the family too hahaha! Congrats !!
@VaxHuntersCan Thank you! 😂 You guys are saving lives. If I ever get the pleasure of meeting any one of you amazing volunteers in person, drinks on me! You guys deserve it!
